storyInfo: Having settled his patients, Hellagur goes out on deck. There, he finds a blond Kazimierz knightess, rousing his memories.

attributes.content: How long have we been standing here...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I can't even see the core city anymore...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Your wounds haven't healed yet. Get some rest. I will take care of things here.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: No, that's not what I meant. Err, how should I say this? You know what I mean...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm hoping Amiya and the others will be back soon.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: It's a marvelous thing to show concern for your leader. That is proof of Rhodes Island's unity. However, pushing yourself so hard is not going to accomplish anything.
You can barely stand still, young man. You can stop hiding your wounds from your friend. I see right through that.
Huh? You... Hellagur?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hellagur is right. We will need you sooner or later, but not now.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: We'll fight alongside one another once your wounds are healed.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Heh... Please, I'm a nobody. Who am I to fight alongside the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: —That said, Hellagur. Owing to the situation we're in, perhaps you should stay inside the ship...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Of course, of course, but Neon and the children are still being checked upon. I will see them as soon as that is over.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: In that case... Right, okay. If things take a wrong turn, I guess I'll just be in the way since I'm injured.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'll head back, then. Be safe.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The view here is vast and wide. We can see the berserk city running amok from here.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Fine eyes as always.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: As always.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You and your men covered several squads and helped them infiltrate Chernobog, though the plan I'd heard from that doctor was a most fearless one.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Fearlessness, bravery, and resolve may be priceless qualities, but they always lead to sacrifices on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Fearlessness doesn't mean not having a plan.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I never imagined you and your men to be such masterful warriors.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You use the sandstorm and the light as cover. Such a surprise attack is no easy feat even for seasoned veterans. You have my admiration.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I heard you were the one who returned Scout's remains to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Are the other Rhodes Islanders quite like him?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I cannot say for certain. I think each and every operator has a different kind of resolve than Scout, even me.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: But all of us operators—all of us who are willing to fight for the Infected and for Rhodes Island—are unafraid of battle.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Everyone fights for a different reason.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: That is why when they are permitted an ambitious, magnificent dream that matches all that they have ever wished for, they will find themselves lost in the current.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Are you talking about Reunion?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: All one and the same...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The operators who infiltrated the city are the most unwavering lot I've met, and they all have the most steadfast convictions.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I choose to believe in those convictions. Their convictions.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: This is my duty as a Rhodes Island Operator. Also, I must thank you for going through the trouble of bringing back Scout's comms. I am sure Chernobog must have been in a very bad situation at the time.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Sadly... I never had the chance to meet that fine warrior.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: His sacrifice roused his fellow soldiers. I believe the effects of his will can still be seen around us.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Yet 'sacrifice' is not a thing of the past. In this war before us, Rhodes Island will see yet more sacrifice. Much more.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Rather than the sacrifices themselves, I think we should think more about what those sacrifices have brought us.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: My job is merely to stand guard here from afar and to await the fruits of justice that they are fighting for with their own blood.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I've met many from Kazimierz like you, young knight, but most of them flawed.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I heard from the other operators that you are known as the Radiant Knight. Your performance in the past has indeed been truly memorable—
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: —From what I know, in present day Kazimierz, knights who receive a title of only a single word are, without exception, among the very best of their ranks. Why did you leave your homeland, if I may ask?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: What the knighthood means now in Kazimierz is very different.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: You, too, left Ursus behind, you said so yourself. Everyone fights for a different reason.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Young Radiant Knight, what is your name?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl. You may also call me operator codename Nearl.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: So that's why... they call you 'Nearl.'
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Where the hell's W?! She goes missing now, of all times?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: You're still counting on her...? Don't you remember how Garcin died?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Save it! Who knows what W and Talulah are thinking?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: We mercenaries put our lives on the line for nothing but coin, no? Don't listen to these Infected. They want their future, and it's got nothing to do with us!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: All we gotta do is kill the enemies in front of our faces and keep following the side that wins. That's been my policy all along.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: But now we can't get in touch with W, and Talulah's abandoned us. Until we get orders from either of them, whose orders are we supposed to follow?! Tell me!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: What's going on? Why are these Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mmph!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Looks like they're fighting amongst themselves. Let's take this chance and slip past. Quick... don't let them spot us. We need to follow the plan and secure the—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You, can't.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I still remember the expression on Barclay's face even now. I had never seen such a complicated look on him, not even when he fought Pegasus himself.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: He told me we had a new enemy, besides Silverlance. A golden one.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Golden. The Golden Pegasus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: A military commander that had only just come to the fore, reorganized multiple knight orders that had been ambushed within only a few hours, and then defended that gorge for three months with nothing but infantry.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Thanks to him, Ursus saw losses far greater than it expected. Its armies had to allocate attack ships to break that formation, and its winter campaign had to be reduced in scale.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The Nearls should be revered as heroes in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But now, a child that bears his blood... has been exiled from the country?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Just water under the bridge... It may be vile, but you needn't worry about that, Hellagur.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Wheresoever I stand in this world, I take pride in my family name, Nearl.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: How is your grandfather?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: He was already bedridden the last time I talked to my family...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Time... Time is full of surprises. War leaves behind heroes. Wounds as well.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Do you despise Ursus, with all your heart?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I've never experienced war myself.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: But I know that Ursus has started many tragic wars. This truth will never cease to be, and there are many Kazimierz who despise the Ursus, even today.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: To refute this hatred... To teach those who lost their families and their homes in war to reject hate... That is a cruel punishment in its own right.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You are a soldier... yet I am not a campaign knight.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: You are still of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Even now, I've never once denied that. I am willing to raise my sword for the ideal that Amiya speaks of, and for the Infected—
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: —But perhaps I will one day be back in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: You are young still... Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Yes... You are young. You yet have the chance to correct everything, including yourself.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: No... No way... Mephisto... He...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What is this? A transformation? Hey, do you still understand... Mmgh... Ah...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Urghh... Ah... T-Tell them to... go...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Talulah turned her back on us!
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: That's not possible! Patriot's the real traitor! Kill him! He's a Sarkaz, he's a Wendigo, and he's an Ursus Army soldier! What part of him can we even trust?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member B

attributes.content: Tsk. Looks like it's our turn to pick sides.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: What do you mean? W just straight up disappeared after she gave us the order to hold here. Do you think Talulah might already have killed her?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: How are the other squads...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Can't get to them. Maybe those Infected nutjobs started their attack on Patriot—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: —It's practically still anarchy out here for most of these folks. I mean, they aren't soldiers. This all hit way more sudden than any coup I've heard of—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Should we regroup with Patriot's squad?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: —Sarkaz follow Sarkaz. Isn't that the iron law?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Besides, he's Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Chernobog.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Its march onwards has not yet ceased.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Did you live there for long?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Not very long. Unfortunately, my lifespan is a little longer than your average Ursus man.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But yes... To answer your question, I lived there.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Can you imagine? It was a nomadic city that hosted a theme park, department stores, and a park with a man-made lake.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: And now, the core city has abandoned the city blocks that were destroyed by the Catastrophe. With ease, it abandoned everything built by the hands of countless generations.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Even the city itself has become a frightening vessel of some wicked conspiracy.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Chernobog was far from beautiful. Its factories polluted the skies.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But scores of innocent Ursus once lived there. Did anyone consider that? Did the ones responsible for instigating this conspiracy?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: None of them ever did.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Anger has blinded them.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: It has blinded everyone, ourselves included.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: What I see now as I gaze upon Chernobog now is not a city. It is a violent machine, powered by the destruction of the livelihoods of countless men, a machine driven by ambition.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: They abused the people's will to live. First, they took the right to live from the Infected. In the end, they even had to pry their will to live away from them.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Your clinic there...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: The things that I built have been destroyed far too many times, but as long as Neon and the others are fine, then the bricks in the ruins will be the only destruction there is.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Neon is fine, and Rhodes Island can provide the treatment they need. This is the only source of satisfaction I have.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You've kept them from danger well. It would've been nigh impossible to evacuate them out of Chernobog after it was devastated by Reunion.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I merely wanted to keep them safe.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You cast aside your status as a military leader for that.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Yes... However, the land of Ursus chases me still.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Sometimes, when I lay my eyes upon Chernobog's ceaseless advance, I cannot tell whether Ursus is chasing me or leaving me behind.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You do not want to make an enemy of Ursus...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Even before its rotten body became engrossed in its endless onslaught, nothing in this world should have stood in Ursus's way.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I once dedicated my life to Ursus. War is a soldier's calling, and I fulfilled the duty that I once believed in.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Nonetheless... in the years since, I made it out of that swamp and gazed upon the lands I once lived in from a different perspective.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Just like you, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: How will a Kazimierz, a Sami, a Lungmenite view the influences our past rulers have left on this world?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: What do they think of Ursus's war?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You said you are yet to experience war. You are young, and you yet have the right to avoid these questions, but we all know the answers, deep in our hearts.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: There is no answer to war, and war needs not an answer.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Violence cannot change anything...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Right... violence.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: My fallen liege was the pride of Ursus. The aspiration that we once spent a lifetime chasing, in his words, all of Ursus was merely within arm's reach.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But did he ever truly see the citizens of Ursus as a part of Ursus itself?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Could he possibly...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Patriot is dead!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: The Ursus spy is dead! He never believed in our cause, but Talulah will lead all Infected to victory!!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Let Talulah and her foolish guards know that she cannot bend the will of all that gather here!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Let them roar, and let them struggle. The traitors will be trampled and crushed by the shields of the enslaved. We will be as the mountains!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: For the Captain! For... Patriot!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Patriot...? The Wendigo? Buldrokkas'tee?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The core city's command tower...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: It's burning.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Amiya... They...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: This is just the beginning.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Reunion's leader is no mere Infected. Her strength and strategy are hardly her truest side. The colossal shadow hanging over Reunion is starting to bare its fangs.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: We must be careful. Should their trickeries succeed, be it Rhodes Island, Lungmen, the Infected... No one will be able to escape this new torrent.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I can only imagine the enemy Amiya is now facing...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's leader... She is far younger than you.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: She is facing either the Infected rioters roused by Reunion, the person behind this all, or perhaps...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...It is possible that she and her friends will face Patriot.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Patriot.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Say his name. He is true to it—A pure-blooded Wendigo, an Ursus army man.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The leader of the Infected Guerrillas of the Northern Tundra, Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: He will be the last obstacle between Rhodes Island and Reunion.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I heard about him during the emergency meeting. It's not often that Dr. Kal'tsit treats an enemy... a lone enemy with such caution...
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: He is worthy of her caution, for he is far more formidable an enemy than one can imagine.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Do you two know each other?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: We are old army buddies, and he is a true soldier.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: It has nothing to do with his blood, and it has even less to do with his accomplishments and rank.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: —He is a Wendigo, yet he is called an Ursus. Do you find that surprising?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Not at all.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Our status and ideology should not be predetermined by our upbringing. This is something I've come to understand very well.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: You seem to think Rhodes Island hardly stands a chance in this battle?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Not exactly...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee could not escape the cage he drew for himself with his ideals... because of the ideals he believed in.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Rhodes Island chose to slay Talulah to fulfill its own objective. This is rash, but it is their only way to realize some kind of compromise.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But he is different. He became a symbol of the Infected and the rebels, and allowed it to expand.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Reunion is what it is because of him, and that is also why it will become his greatest weakness.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You mean...?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.text: The Chernobog command tower rages into an inferno.
Hellagur gazes at the red-stained sky, not looking away for a moment.

attributes.content: Fate has driven him into this dead end. He has long been aware, but he will never give in.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: He will fight until the end.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: And he will meet his fate.
attributes.name: Hellagur
